segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite typical for daytime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands at the sink, intently focused on drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her movements are calm and methodical as she polishes the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, something isn't right here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice this happening right in front of her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm truly surprised by her complete obliviousness to the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause a lot of water damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little sad that she's so absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear someone might slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR
